response.raw:
Here is the memo:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Establishment Representatives
From: [Your Name], Senior Shipping Receiving and Inventory Clerk
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Rectifying Shipping Issues

Dear Valued Establishment Representatives,

It has come to our attention that there have been some issues with recent shipments, including damages, shortages, and products not conforming to specifications. As your dedicated Shipping Receiving and Inventory Clerk, I want to work closely with you to quickly resolve these problems to ensure your complete satisfaction.

Please respond back with the specific details of any shipments you have received in the last 30 days that had one or more of the following issues:
- Damaged items
- Shortages/missing items
- Products not meeting your exact specifications or requirements

For each problem shipment, please provide:
1) Shipment reference number
2) Date shipment was received 
3) Detailed description of the issue (damage, shortage, or nonconformance)
4) Photos documenting the issue, if available

Once I receive this information from you, I will personally review each case and work diligently with our shipping and supplier partners to determine the root cause and implement corrective actions. This may involve filing claims, arranging for replacements/reshipments, or updating future orders to ensure your specifications are met.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation and assistance in resolving these issues. My goal is to provide you with the highest level of service and support. Please let me know if you need anything else.

Best Regards,
[Your Name]
Senior Shipping Receiving and Inventory Clerk
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
